conclusion: The wire frame consists of a semi-circular arc and a straight line segment. The plane of the wire frame is perpendicular to the magnetic field. The straight part of the wire frame experiences a force F.
The force on a straight conductor of length L carrying current I in a magnetic field B is given by: F = I L B.

conclusion: The force on the semi-circular arc is: F_arc = I (πr) B
